data.title: Guitar Shows, Conventions, Vinyl records and Vacuum Tubes
data.meta_description: Buy, sell or trade guitars, musical instruments, vinyl records or vacuum tubes at our convention in North East Ohio or Pittsburgh PA
data.text:
LP Sound

LP Sound hosts guitar conventions, shows and exhibitions for regional dealers. Each venue exposes our dealers to a well established and growing clientele that are notified in advance of meets in their area. Floor, booth and table space are affordable and fill up fast. Interested dealers should call (440) 865-4301 or use our Contact Us Form to reserve space.

Upcoming Events

WhenWhatWhereMore Mid Ohio Record & CD Convention Ashland, Ohio Details

Coming Soon

We will soon be expanding our venues to include more meets for classic vinyl records. A section on this site will soon be devoted to them. We are also kicking around the idea of an antique electronics venue. We have tons of vacuum tubes, vintage record players and such. If nothing else, we will set up an online platform for buying, selling or trading the same. See you at the next show.
